exact_source: Red Hill Minerals may earn a 75% interest in the Curnamona Project by spending $6.5 million on exploration over the farm-in period of up to five years. Red Hill Minerals has committed to spend a minimum $1.5 million of expenditure within the first two years... (Total potential AUD 6.5M * 0.70 USD/AUD = USD 4,550,000).
